metadata.Title: CVE-2011-4099 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.Description:
The capsh program in libcap before 2.22 does not change the current workingdirectory when the --chroot option is specified, which allows local usersto bypass the chroot restrictions via unspecified vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2011-4099` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libcap2 - 1:2.22-1ubuntu3
libcap2-bin - 1:2.22-1ubuntu3
libpam-cap - 1:2.22-1ubuntu3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libcap2 package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:2.22-1ubuntu3').
